attributes.action: Stop the Expansion of Tesco in Clevedon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco is planning a new Extra Superstore in Clevedon, which is a small residential town, without major development, and already have a Tesco, plus other supermarkets, the new Tesco Extra Store will not enhance the environment, will not be in keeping with its residental surroundings, the infrastructure will not cope with the extra traffic and the additional car emmisions in a residental area, will affect the life of the local community, which has many young families. Also the additional noise pollution in the evening and night in a residental area will be determental. There is a Tesco, so there is no need for such a huge superstore in such a small residental town.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the Expansion of Tesco in Clevedon".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13536.asp

Prime Minister's Office
